function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on AI and ML for disease outbreak prediction","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions leading to delayed response to outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Regular validation and calibration of AI and ML models with ground truth data.","Technologies":"Machine learning, deep learning, data validation algorithms.","People":"Public health officials, government agencies, and healthcare providers.","Owner":"AI and ML developers, technology companies, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Inaccurate identification of potential drugs for clinical trials","Impact":"Wasting resources on ineffective drugs and delaying the development of effective treatments.","Mitigation":"Validation of drug suggestions through rigorous clinical trials and testing.","Technologies":"AI, data analysis, clinical trial management systems.","People":"Patients, pharmaceutical companies, clinical researchers.","Owner":"AI and ML developers, pharmaceutical companies, healthcare organizations."}]}
